Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 4/1/1965 to a 1-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1965, hitting .440 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/6/1966 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Released by New York (N) on 7/2/1967...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 7/2/1967 to a 1-year deal worth $20,000,000 per year...
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1968...
Injured on 6/21/1969 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/9/1971, off Ray Culp (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/23/1971, off Horacio Pina (HOU)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1971...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 9/1/1973...
Had 6 hits with 2 RBI against Philadelphia on 9/18/1979...
Injured on 7/20/1980 with a Fractured Hip, out for 5 weeks...
